title: Plats gotten even more dumb since my last diamond account.
body:
{{champion:28}}  I'm sitting here waiting for Kog to get out of position while waiting for my ulti on the side lines.  It's blatantly obvious I don't have ult, I literally just used it to nuke someone.  even ping back off for 50.

{{champion:12}}  I better turret dive a Gnar + kogmaw + braum. This is totally going to work. JK I get my team killed.

"Report Eve. Didn't follow."

{{champion:28}} Do you even read chat? Like at all?

{{champion:12}} Why would I read chat? You cost us game by not going in.

{{champion:28}} K. Well you have fun then.
